{{Description|Now that the [[Stormterror]] crisis has passed, it's clear skies above [[Mondstadt]] once again.<br>However, the memory of facing [[Dvalin]] in the sky amidst the storms is ever so vivid.<br>Relive your memories and once again partake in the battle. Maybe you'll learn something new.|Memories: Storming Terror}}
'''Confront Stormterror''' is a [[Trounce Domain]] battle unlocked after completing {{Quest|Calm Before the Storm}}. Players can relive the fight they had with [[Dvalin]] in ''[[A Long Shot]]'' and receive bountiful rewards.

==Enemies==
{{Card|Stormterror Dvalin|type=Enemy|show_caption=1}}

==Rules==
{{Transclude|Domain|trouncerule|section=1}}
* Unlike other Trounce Domains, Confront Stormterror cannot be played in [[Co-Op Mode]], presumably because of the unique fixed camera angle.

{{Weekly Boss Rewards
|exclusive=Dvalin's Plume,Dvalin's Claw,Dvalin's Sigh
|gem=Vayuda Turquoise,Vajrada Amethyst,Varunada Lazurite
}}
